item.title: Are tariffs worth the risk to our retirement — and overall — economic security?
item.description: Raucous debate clarified the national defense case for strategic tariffs, but it’s hard to argue for a worldwide tariff war

item.title: General Dynamics CEO on Trump tariffs: Don’t ask
item.description: General Dynamics CEO Phebe Novakovic won’t comment on potential tariff impacts — saying that with all the uncertainty, any estimate would be “sheer sp...

item.title: Why Apple investors might be too optimistic about what’s ahead
item.description: UBS analysts worry that the next iPhone launch will be lackluster, meaning Wall Street’s expectations for next year are too high.

item.title: ‘I find it ridiculous’: My friend cleaned out her father’s bank account. Should I intervene?
item.description: “Before you accuse me of being pea green with envy, I have more savings, own properties, and have all my debts paid.”

item.title: Fed Beige Book says ‘pervasive’ uncertainty from trade fights depresses outlook for economy
item.description: Economy gets short-term boost from buyers trying to avoid tariffs
